did.head: Collection Summary
did.abstract: Valentin Felix was a merchant in Tucson, Arizona and owner of the Roof Garden Grocery and Meat Market, later the Roof Garden Fish Company. This collection contains correspondence, financial accounts and bills, insurance papers, and other materials chiefly concerning the store and other Tucson real estate.

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

did.langmaterial: Materials are in English; with some letters in Spanish.

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

userestrict.p: It is the responsibility of the user to obtain permission to publish from the owner of the copyright (the institution, the creator of the record, the author or his/her transferees, heirs, legates, or literary executors). prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Papers of Valentin Felix (AZ 125). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Merchants, Tucson, Ariz.; owner of the Roof Garden Grocery and Meat Market, later the Roof Garden Fish Company.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is organized into 3 series. Materials are in chronological arrangement.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Correspondence, financial accounts and bills, insurance papers, and other materials chiefly concerning the store and other Tucson real estate. Includes a large amount of bills for supplies from Tucson merchants. Also includes one photograph of the market interior, 1915; and a certification of a ranch brand, 1891.
